intro: Senecio chungtienensis, commonly known as the Chungtien Senecio, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. It produces small, yellow flowers that bloom in the summer months. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
